title: Adobe InDesign CC 2019 14.0.130 (x64/x86) Multilingual + Medicin
description:
Adobe InDesign CC 2019
Adobe InDesign CC 2019 is a professional product for designing the design of any print or online publications. Adobe InDesign CC 2019 has all the advanced features and tools of the machine layout, with which you can quickly and efficiently develop the design of pages of any complexity. The program supports the import of drawings and text from a wide variety of formats, includingPDF and XMLfiles, offers a large set of tools for editing imported materials, which includes working with layers, cascading styles, tables and templates.

Adobe InDesign CC 2019 is a universal content publishing application that provides precise control over the design andtypographyat pixel level. Convenient adaptation of layouts to different page formats, orientations and devices while maintaining high image quality.

Benefits of Adobe InDesign CC 2019
Import comments from PDF files
Reviews in PDF files created in InDesign CC 2019 can now be imported back for editing. This makes it easy to work with multiple participants.

Layout Customization
Text and graphics are reconfigured with one click when the document is resized.

Property Bar
Simple, intuitive interface provides easy access to controls – when you need it.

Content tailored
Images remain in focus due to the fact that their size is automatically resized and adapted using the new feature based on machine learning Adobe Sensei.

Visual font search
Browsing various classes of fonts has been simplified to quickly find the right font. In addition, you can now select one of the sample text options.

Creating Projects with SVG Color Fonts
Use fonts in projects that contain several colors, gradients, and degrees of transparency. All this is possible thanks to the SVG OpenType fonts
